00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00053     public sealed class BetaDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00054     {
00055         double _alpha;
00056         double _beta;
00057         double _lnbetaAlphaBeta;
00058 
00059         GammaDistribution _gammaAlpha;
00060         GammaDistribution _gammaBeta;
00061 
00062         #region Construction
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067         public
00068         BetaDistribution()
00069             : base()
00070         {
00071             _gammaAlpha = new GammaDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00072             _gammaBeta = new GammaDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00073             SetDistributionParameters(1.0, 1.0);
00074         }
00075 
00084         public
00085         BetaDistribution(
00086             RandomSource random
00087             )
00088             : base(random)
00089         {
00090             _gammaAlpha = new GammaDistribution(random);
00091             _gammaBeta = new GammaDistribution(random);
00092             SetDistributionParameters(1.0, 1.0);
00093         }
00094 
00099         public
00100         BetaDistribution(
00101             double alpha,
00102             double beta
00103             )
00104             : base()
00105         {
00106             _gammaAlpha = new GammaDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00107             _gammaBeta = new GammaDistribution(this.RandomSource);
00108             SetDistributionParameters(alpha, beta);
00109         }
00110         #endregion
00111 
00116         public override RandomSource RandomSource
00117         {
00118             get
00119             {
00120                 return base.RandomSource;
00121             }
00122 
00123             set
00124             {
00125                 base.RandomSource = value;
00126                 _gammaAlpha.RandomSource = value;
00127                 _gammaBeta.RandomSource = value;
00128             }
00129         }
00130 
00131         #region Distribution Parameters
00132 
00133 
00134 
00135         public double Alpha
00136         {
00137             get { return _alpha; }
00138             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _beta); }
00139         }
00140 
00144         public double Beta
00145         {
00146             get { return _beta; }
00147             set { SetDistributionParameters(_alpha, value); }
00148         }
00149 
00153         public
00154         void
00155         SetDistributionParameters(
00156             double alpha,
00157             double beta
00158             )
00159         {
00160             if(!IsValidParameterSet(alpha, beta))
00161             {
00162                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00163             }
00164 
00165             _alpha = alpha;
00166             _beta = beta;
00167             _gammaAlpha.SetDistributionParameters(alpha, 1.0);
00168             _gammaBeta.SetDistributionParameters(beta, 1.0);
00169             _lnbetaAlphaBeta = Fn.BetaLn(alpha, beta);
00170         }
00171 
00178         public static
00179         bool
00180         IsValidParameterSet(
00181             double alpha,
00182             double beta
00183             )
00184         {
00185             return alpha > 0.0 && beta > 0.0;
00186         }
00187         #endregion
00188 
00189         #region Distribution Properties
00190 
00191 
00192 
00193         public override double Minimum
00194         {
00195             get { return 0.0; }
00196         }
00197 
00201         public override double Maximum
00202         {
00203             get { return 1.0; }
00204         }
00205 
00209         public override double Mean
00210         {
00211             get { return _alpha / (_alpha + _beta); }
00212         }
00213 
00217         public override double Median
00218         {
00219             get { return double.NaN; }
00220         }
00221 
00225         public override double Variance
00226         {
00227             get
00228             {
00229                 double ab = _alpha + _beta;
00230                 return (_alpha * _beta) / (ab * ab * (ab + 1.0));
00231             }
00232         }
00233 
00237         public override double Skewness
00238         {
00239             get
00240             {
00241                 double m = 2 * (_beta - _alpha) * Math.Sqrt(_alpha + _beta + 1.0);
00242                 double n = (_alpha + _beta + 2.0) * Math.Sqrt(_alpha * _beta);
00243                 return m / n;
00244             }
00245         }
00246 
00250         public override
00251         double
00252         ProbabilityDensity(
00253             double x
00254             )
00255         {
00256             return Math.Exp(
00257                 (_alpha - 1.0) * Math.Log(x)
00258                 + (_beta - 1.0) * Math.Log(1 - x)
00259                 - _lnbetaAlphaBeta
00260                 );
00261         }
00262 
00266         public override
00267         double
00268         CumulativeDistribution(
00269             double x
00270             )
00271         {
00272             return Fn.BetaRegularized(_alpha, _beta, x);
00273         }
00274         #endregion
00275 
00276         #region Generator
00277 
00278 
00279 
00280 
00281         public override
00282         double
00283         NextDouble()
00284         {
00285             double x = _gammaAlpha.NextDouble();
00286 
00287             return x / (x + _gammaBeta.NextDouble());
00288         }
00289         #endregion
00290     }
00291 }
